assignments.name: Set_Indexation_as_waived_on_Quote
assignments.label: Set Indexation as waived on Quote

decisions.description: Check to see if indexation records are availble to calculate the variable indexation rate. If not, the pricing factors can not yet be applied.
decisions.name: Are_rates_available
decisions.label: Are rates available?

decisions.name: Check_if_cap_indexation_rate_exists
decisions.label: Check if cap indexation rate exists?

decisions.description: Check if the indexation rate is variable or not.
decisions.name: Check_if_indexation_is_variable
decisions.label: Check if indexation is variable?

decisions.description: Check if previous indexation is added on renewal or not.
decisions.name: Previous_indexation_added
decisions.label: Previous indexation added?

decisions.description: Check if the upcoming indexation is applied to the renewal or not.
decisions.name: Upcoming_Indexation_applied
decisions.label: Upcoming Indexation applied?

decisions.description: Check if the upcoming indexation on the renewal is waived or not.
decisions.name: Upcoming_Indexation_Waived
decisions.label: Upcoming Indexation Waived?

Flow.description: BODEV-4540 updated with check if variable indexation rate is available This screen flow can be triggered from Opportunity or Quote and pricing factors are applied on the quote.

formulas.name: indexationAvgEndDate
indexationAvgStartDate

formulas.description: If the current indexation rate (Fixed/Variable) is more than 2%, the threshold of 2% should be applied to the default price of the product.
formulas.name: IndexationThreshold

formulas.description: Calculate new ARR only when previous indexation is added on renewal.
formulas.name: previousIndexationapplied

formulas.description: Calculate Cumulative indexation to be applied on renewal
formulas.name: QLICumulativeIndexation

formulas.description: Calculate the new renewal ARR when upcoming indexation is applied
formulas.name: upcomingindexationapplied

Flow.label: Apply pricing factors on Quote

fields.name: Confirm_Screen
fields.fieldText:
The new renewal ARR will be {!Get_Quote.CurrencyIsoCode} {!ScreenRenewalARR}.


Pricing factors to be applied :


Original Renewal ARR : {!Get_Quote.CurrencyIsoCode} {!Get_Quote.Initial_Default_Price_ARR__c}

fields.name: AddlModulesARR
fields.fieldText: ARR from Upsell : {!Get_Quote.CurrencyIsoCode} {!AdditionalModuleARR}

fields.name: cumulative
fields.fieldText: Cumulative Indexation {!Get_Account.Cumulative_Indexation__c}% : {!Get_Quote.CurrencyIsoCode} {!ScreenCumulativeIndexationAmount}

fields.name: Waive
fields.fieldText: Waive Indexation? : {!Waive_Indexation}

fields.name: Upcoming
fields.fieldText: Upcoming Indexation {!CurrentIndexationRate}% : {!Get_Quote.CurrencyIsoCode} {!upcomingindexationamount}

fields.name: renewaluplift
fields.fieldText: Renewal Uplift {!of_price_uplift_to_be_applied}% : {!renewalOpp.CurrencyIsoCode} {!renewalupliftamount}

fields.name: caution
fields.fieldText:
Do you want to apply the specified scenario to the Quote and Products?

  • You can still change the price from the above price through negotiation.
  • Product prices changed manually before the simulation will not be considered while calculating the new Renewal ARR.

fields.name: Apply_Changes
fields.fieldText: Apply Changes?

fields.name: ConfirmationScreen_1
fields.fieldText: Pricing factors are applied to Quote successfully.

fields.name: notfillederror
fields.fieldText:
Indexation information is not filled on the account, please contact the legal team.

Once the information is filled, retry the process to apply the pricing factors.

fields.name: OpportunityInfo
fields.fieldText:
Opportunity Information:


Opportunity Name : {!renewalOpp.Name}

Opportunity ARR : {!renewalOpp.CurrencyIsoCode} {!renewalOpp.ARR__c}

Price Uplift on renewal? : {!ScreenPriceUpliftOnOpp}

Price Uplift on Renewal % : {!ScreenPriceUplift}%

Indexation waived on renewal ? : {!renewalOpp.Waive_Indexation__c}

fields.name: QuoteInfo
fields.fieldText:
Quote Information:


Quote Name : {!Get_Quote.Name}

Quote ARR : {!Get_Quote.CurrencyIsoCode} {!Get_Quote.ARR__c}

Price Uplift on renewal? : {!Get_Quote.Price_Uplift_On_Renewal__c}

Price Uplift on Renewal % : {!ScreenPriceUplift}%

Indexation waived on renewal ? : {!Get_Quote.Waive_Indexation__c}

fields.name: Account_Info
fields.fieldText:
Account Information:


Indexation : {!Get_Account.Indexation__c}

Indexation Type : {!Get_Account.Indexation_Type__c}

Cumulative Indexation on account : {!ScreenAccountCumulativeIndexation}%

Price Uplift On Renewal? : {!ScreenPriceUpliftOnAccount}

Price Uplift on Renewal % : {!ScreenUpliftPercentageAccount}%

fields.name: of_AddIndexationText
fields.fieldText: Cumulative indexation rate ({!CumulativeIndexationPercentage}%) will be applied to product pricing.

fields.name: WaiveIndexationText
fields.fieldText: Apply upcoming indexation rate ({!CurrentIndexationRate}%) to product pricing? Or waive?

fields.name: indexationwaived
fields.fieldText: Indexation is waived on the renewal, would you like to change the decision?

fields.name: Waive_Indexation
fields.fieldText: Waive Indexation?
fields.helpText:
When 'Yes' is selected, indexation is waived for the entire renewal contract period.

When 'No' is selected, indexation is charged in each year of the renewal contract.

When 'First Year' is selected, indexation is waived for first year of the renewal.

fields.name: CapRate
fields.fieldText: Would you like to apply Cap to the Variable indexation rate on the renewal?

fields.name: Cap_Indexation_Rate
fields.fieldText: Cap Indexation Rate
fields.helpText: If the Cap Indexation Rate is lower than the Upcoming indexation rate, Cap indexation rate is applied as current indexation rate on renewal pricing.

fields.name: renewalupliftapplied
fields.fieldText: Renewal uplift is already applied, would you like to change the decision?

fields.name: of_priceupliftText
fields.fieldText: Renewal uplift is not applied, would you like to apply? If yes, how much %?

fields.name: Apply_Price_Uplift
fields.fieldText: Apply Price Uplift?
fields.helpText: Price uplift decision applied in this screen will be synced to the account and opportunity.

fields.name: of_price_uplift_to_be_applied
fields.fieldText: % of price uplift to be applied?
fields.helpText: Price uplift % applied in this screen will be synced to the account and opportunity.

fields.name: Nochangesinsimulation
fields.fieldText: Pricing factors are not applied to the Quote. Click 'Finish' to complete the process.

fields.name: NoChanges
fields.fieldText: Pricing factors are not changed during the process to generate the new renewal ARR.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ConfirmationScreen_1
fields.fieldText: Quote has been created and pricing factors are applied on the Quote.

fields.name: ConfirmScreen
fields.fieldText:
The new renewal ARR will be {!renewalOpp.CurrencyIsoCode} {!ScreenRenewalARR}.


Pricing factors to be applied :


Original Renewal ARR : {!renewalOpp.CurrencyIsoCode} {!InitialDefaultPriceQuote}

fields.name: AdditionalARR
fields.fieldText: ARR from Upsell : {!renewalOpp.CurrencyIsoCode} {!AdditionalModuleARR}

fields.name: Copy_1_of_cumulative
fields.fieldText: Cumulative Indexation {!CumulativeIndexationPercentage}% : {!renewalOpp.CurrencyIsoCode} {!ScreenCumulativeIndexationAmount}

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Waive
fields.fieldText: Waive Indexation? : {!Waive_Indexation}

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Upcoming
fields.fieldText: Upcoming Indexation {!CurrentIndexationRate}% : {!renewalOpp.CurrencyIsoCode} {!upcomingindexationamount}

fields.name: Copy_1_of_renewaluplift
fields.fieldText: Renewal Uplift {!of_price_uplift_to_be_applied}% : {!renewalOpp.CurrencyIsoCode} {!renewalupliftamount}

fields.name: Confirmation_check
fields.fieldText:
Would you like to update the pricing factors on the renewal?


ARR On Quote : {!Get_Quote.CurrencyIsoCode} {!Get_Quote.ARR__c}

Applied Cumulative Indexation : {!screenCumulativeIndexation}%

Applied Upcoming Indexation : {!ScreenUpcomingIndexation}%

Applied Price Uplift : {!ScreenPriceUplift}%

fields.name: rates_not_available
fields.fieldText: This renewal only starts in the next year (start date: {!renewalOpp.Startdate_contract__c}) . Therefore the variable indexation rate is not yet known. This will become available from 1st of September. Please reach out to finance to ask for an alternative.
